description:
Angler’s Club: Ultimate Bass
Fishing™ 3D captures the thrill of
fishing by providing the most
authentic and natural fishing
experience in stunning 3D.
Featuring over 40 championship
tournaments, players can compete
and win trophies using a variety of
skills to become a world class
fishing champion. Players will be
able to choose from a selection of
boats and guide them through the
legendary waters of Lake Sunrise
in a quest to catch the giant bass
coveted by local residents.
name:
Angler’s Club:
Ultimate Bass Fishing™ 3D
